globalHeaders.content-security-policy: base-uri 'self'; default-src; 'self' script-src 'self' 'wasm-unsafe-eval' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com ; style-src 'self' https://fonts.googleapis.com/ https://fonts.gstatic.com/; connect-src https://bodylinesports-api.azurewebsites.net https://bodylinesports-staging-api.azurewebsites.net; object-src 'none'
